text: Defeat Ledeborg's King on the field of battle.
Clear out the bandits from your lands

With the settlement of the Danes to our East, we acquired a temperamental and dangerous neighbour. Our disagreements with Ledeborg have spilled over into conflict, and Djurby has joined the war! We must deal with these distractions quickly, lest we be caught unaware when the Welsh come to avenge their former King.

We have been at war for many years, and while we emerged victorious, our Kingdom needs time to recover. While our fighting men were away, bandits took advantage of the chaos to pillage our Kingdom. Our first task now should be to root them out.

We have many ambitions to restore our Kingdom to greatness, but we must first secure our borders and build our strength. Viking Raiders have come ashore near Coldingaham, and will lay waste to our countryside if we do not intercept them.

Our Kingdom has seen many hardships since the death of Rodhri the Great, being constantly raided by the Vikings while the threat of Civil War looms. Bandits took advantage of the chaos to pillage our Kingdom. Our first task now should be to root them out.
Occupy or Sack the City of Jórvík

St. Oswald was a Northymbrian King who was known for fully embracing the Christian faith as few other northern Anglo-Saxon kings had before him. Unforunately his resting place is now occupied by the heathens in the North, whose presence defiles the holy grounds where he lie. We must send a raiding party into the North that we may recover his remains and relocate them to a more sacred resting place.
